rooms.description: Spacious central living area facing the courtyard for family gatherings and socializing. Incorporates large windows and doors aligned with Vastu principles to invite positive energy.
Compact yet functional kitchen attached to the living room for ease of movement. Designed with safety measures and wheelchair-accessible design elements.
Private master bedroom adjacent to a small balcony overlooking the courtyard. Includes built-in storage for space optimization.
Child bedroom with ample natural light and proximity to the courtyard. Designed with safety features for young occupants.
Guest room providing a comfortable space for visitors; includes accessible design elements in case of mobility needs.
Master bathroom adjacent to master bedroom with wheelchair accessibility in mind.
Small bathroom serving the child bedroom and guest room; designed for easy access.
Compact servant quarters located in a separate wing near the kitchen area to ensure privacy.
Small private gym integrated into the farmhouse design with ample space for basic workout equipment; includes accessible entry and movement path.

openings.description: Main entrance door placed to maximize Vastu alignment. Includes ramp for wheelchair accessibility.
Secondary entrance in the southeast corner providing alternate access; aligned with natural energy flows.
Dedicated entry for servants with easy connectivity to kitchen and servant quarters.
Open passage connecting the central courtyard with all adjoining rooms ensuring natural ventilation and light.
